modName: Ancher - Bosmer Follower of Setvi - Ancher - Acolyte Bosmer de Setvi - Skyrim
summary: Add a Bosmer essential follower in Riverwood. Ajoute un acolyte Bosmer essentiel a Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]

Review Link:
[url=http://wewillnotbow.tumblr.com/post/96860472303/mods-bosmer-themed-mods]http://wewillnotbow.tumblr.com/post/96860472303/mods-bosmer-themed-mods[/url][/color][/size][/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]

[/color][/size][/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3][url=http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=67237]http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=67237[/url]
[/color][/size][/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]
Description:[/color]
Add a Bosmer (set as essential) follower in Riverwood.

[color=#d9ead3]Location:[/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Sleeping Giant Inn.[/size]

[/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]Spells & special abilities:[/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Flames
Healing
Command Animal (Racial)

[color=#d9ead3]Resist Disease & Poison:[/color]
Your Bosmer blood gives you 50% resistance to poison and disease (Racial).[/size][/b][b]

[/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]Perk:[/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Bullseye
Purity
Deft Movement
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Unbreakable
Master Locks 100
Perfect Touch
Shadow Warrior.

[color=#d9ead3]Level:[/color]
1-81.

[/size][/b][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]Name:[/color]
Ancher.[/size][/b][b][size=3]

[color=#d9ead3]Other:[/color]
Essential.
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Archer from Valenwood.

[color=#d9ead3]DLC & Required:[/color]
Nothing.

[img]http://oblivion.bonusweb.cz/obrazek/woodelf.gif[/img]

[color=#d9ead3]Description:[/color]
Ajoute un acolyte Bosmer (étant indiqué comme essentiel) à Rivebois.[/size][size=3]

[color=#d9ead3]Location:[/color]
[/size][/b][size=3][b]Auberge du Géant endormi.

[color=#d9ead3]Sorts & pouvoirs spéciaux:[/color]
Flammes
Soin
[/b][/size][b][size=3]Manipulation animale (Raciale)
[/size]
[size=3][color=#d9ead3]Résistance aux maladies et au poison:[/color]
De 50% (compétence raciale Bosmer passive).[/size]

[size=3][color=#d9ead3]Perk:[/color]
Blocage[/size]
[size=3]Pureté
Mouvement habile[/size]
[size=3]Incassable
Verrous de maître 100[/size]
[/b][b][size=3]Grand escamoteur[/size]
[/b][b][size=3]Guerrier de l'ombre.

[color=#d9ead3]Niveaux:[/color]
1-81.

[color=#d9ead3]Nom:[/color][/size]
[/b][size=3][b]Ancher.

[/b][/size][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]Autre:[/color]
Essentiel.
[/size][/b][size=3][b]Archer de Val-Boisé.

[/b][/size][b][size=3][color=#d9ead3]DLC/Requis:[/color]
Rien.[/size][/b][b][size=3]
